description: The BR-30 Regional Transport Office serves the Sitamarhi district in Bihar, operating under the Tirhut Division. Located in the administrative hub of Dumra, it manages vehicle registrations, driving license issuances, and road tax collection for this Indo-Nepal border region. The office is responsible for enforcing the Motor Vehicles Act across various blocks, ensuring road safety and revenue collection for the state.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Dumra Road, Sitamarhi, Bihar
